message: Welcome to our store! We're excited to offer you a high-quality product. Given its superior quality, it's valued at $12000 by our customers. Considering its exceptional value, we're selling it for a special introductory price of $10000. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a top-notch item.
I'd like to observe more sales before making a decision.

Hello there! We appreciate your interest in our products. This time, we're offering a unique opportunity to experience something different. Our current product, while not as high-quality as our previous offerings, still holds value for those looking for variety. With a price of $10000, it might just be the perfect fit for your needs. Please consider this as an exciting chance to explore a different side of our product line.

Since the product is described as 'not as high-quality as our previous offerings' and no products have been sold yet, I don't have any information to contradict Alice's statement. Given the product's value to me is either $12000 for high-quality or $0 for low-quality, and considering Alice's description leans towards it being low-quality, I choose not to take the risk at this price.
